description.value:
Special: Blast (3)

Note: Enemies damaged by weapon must make -40 Toughness Test, if failed enemies take 2d10 Toughness Damage each round for 1d5 rounds. Enemies that reach 0 Toughness as a Result of this are killed and frozen solid. Further damage causes the corpse to shatter.
